item.title: Programms
item.description: Factorial <?php $number = 6; /*number to get factorial */ $fact = 1; for($k=1;$k<=$number;++$k) { $fact = $fact*$k; } echo "Factorial of $number is ".$fact; ?> Factorial (Recursion) function factorial($number) { if ($number < 2) { return 1; } else { return ($number * factorial($number-1)); } } Fibonacci a, b = 1, 1 total = 0 while a <= 10: a, b = b, a+b # the real formula for Fibonacci sequence print(a) Fibonacci (PHP) <?
